children.description: This prop isn't supported. Use the component prop if you need to change the children structure.
children.description_zh: 不支持此道具。如果需要更改子结构，请使用组件 prop。

classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.See CSS classes API below for more details.
classes.description_zh: 覆盖或扩展应用于组件的样式。有关详细信息，请参阅下面的 CSS 类 API。

showLabel.description: If true, the BottomNavigationAction will show its label. By default, only the selected BottomNavigationAction inside BottomNavigation will show its label.The prop defaults to the value (false) inherited from the parent BottomNavigation component.
showLabel.description_zh: 如果为 true，则 BottomNavigationAction 将显示其标签。默认情况下，只有 BottomNavigation 中选定的 BottomNavigationAction 才会显示其标签。该 prop 默认为从父 BottomNavigation 组件继承的值 （false）。

sx.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.See the `sx` page for more details.
sx.description_zh: 允许定义系统覆盖以及其他 CSS 样式的系统属性。有关更多详细信息，请参阅“sx”页面。

value.description: You can provide your own value. Otherwise, we fallback to the child position index.
value.description_zh: 您可以提供自己的价值。否则，我们将回退到子位置索引。
